sentences.sContent: I've got a typerwriter with a microprocessor.
sentences.sCn: 我有一台装有微处理机的打字机。

sentences.sContent: A microprocessor will check for interrupts at the end of every instruction.
sentences.sCn: 微处理器将在每一个指令末尾检查有无中断.

trans.tranOther: the central  chip  in a computer, which controls most of its operations
